relevant_findings.heart_murmur: Grade 3/6 systolic murmur radiating to carotid arteries

relevant_findings.bone_marrow_exam: Dysplasia in erythroid precursors and megakaryocytes, 2% of the cells were blasts

physical_examinations.date: 5 months after initiation of lenalidomide therapy

relevant_findings.bone_marrow_exam: 15% cellular with increased erythropoiesis and near-complete cytogenetic response

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Morphologic normalization of the marrow with increased erythropoiesis

relevant_findings.bone_marrow_exam: Increased percentage of myeloblasts (11%), recurrence of morphologic dysplasia in myeloid cells

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of disease with more severe dysplasia and karyotypic evolution indicative of transformation to acute myeloid leukemia
